summary: This is Mod which can make a friend a certain guard who sold the soul to the evil spirit, in order to win a certain gorilla.
descriptionHtml:
I'm sorry.
I can not speak English.

Since it made in the environment which translated Japanese into English, a certain fault may occur in the other environment.

Following Mod is required to use this.
[Cloaks of Skyrim]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/?

This is Mod which can make a friend a certain guard who sold the soul to the evil spirit, in order to win a certain gorilla.
He is relaxing by The Drunken Huntsman.
Since he sells the soul to the evil spirit, unless you invite to an adventure, he has neglected work as a guard by The Drunken Huntsman.
However, he who sold the soul to the evil spirit will not surely be able to win that gorilla, either.
Oh, a pitiful guard ...

In addition, if this guard is made into a friend, a big gorilla will carry out stalking.
author: Mao
